name: Deploy to Azure Container Apps

on:
  workflow_dispatch:
  push:
    branches: [main]

env:
  ACR_NAME: imageresizerapp
  CONTAINER_IMAGE: imageresizerapp
  RESOURCE_GROUP: web-apps

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: ğŸ› ï¸ Checkout Repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: âš™ï¸ Setup .NET 8 SDK
        uses: actions/setup-dotnet@v4
        with:
          dotnet-version: 8.0.x
      - name: ğŸ“¦ Restore Dependencies
        run: dotnet restore ./ImageResizerAPI.sln
      - name: ğŸ—ï¸ Build Project
        run: dotnet build ./ImageResizerAPI.sln --no-restore

  publish:
    needs: build
    if: github.event_name == 'push' || github.event_name == 'workflow_dispatch'
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: ğŸ› ï¸ Checkout Repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: âš™ï¸ Setup .NET 8 SDK
        uses: actions/setup-dotnet@v4
        with:
          dotnet-version: 8.0.x

      - name: ğŸ”‘ Login to Azure Container Registry
        uses: docker/login-action@v3
        with:
          registry: ${{ env.ACR_NAME }}.azurecr.io
          username: ${{ secrets.AZURE_REGISTRY_USERNAME }}
          password: ${{ secrets.AZURE_REGISTRY_PASSWORD }}

      - name: ğŸ—ï¸ Publish and Build Docker Image
        working-directory: ./src/
        run: |
          dotnet publish ImageResizerAPI.csproj -c Release -o publish
          docker build -t ${{ env.ACR_NAME }}.azurecr.io/${{ env.CONTAINER_IMAGE }}:${{ github.sha }} .
          docker push ${{ env.ACR_NAME }}.azurecr.io/${{ env.CONTAINER_IMAGE }}:${{ github.sha }}
